class.name: gd_AIS_SelectionScheme
class.brief_description: Sets selection schemes for interactive contexts.
class.description:
This class provides an enum for selection schemes used in Open CASCADE interactive contexts. These schemes define how selection operations are performed, such as replacing, adding, or removing objects from the current selection.
Note: This is a pure enum wrapper for Godot GDExtension and does not wrap any underlying C++ object.

constant.name: Replace
constant.description: Clears current selection and selects detected objects.

constant.name: Add
constant.description: Adds detected object to current selection.

constant.name: Remove
constant.description: Removes detected object from the current selection.

constant.name: XOR
constant.description: Performs XOR for detected objects, other selected not touched.

constant.name: ReplaceExtra
constant.description: Replace with one difference: if result of replace is empty, and current selection contains detected element, it will be selected.
